name: Space Jumper (Cro-K)
description:
Hello,

This is a really hard  third person 3D Platformer where your objective is to collect all kunas for Croatian President Kolinda in her campaign to stay president. This is my first game that I made in Unity 2019.2.14f1  for a project in my. This is only fictional.

Mechanics:

Its really easy to control you use simple controls like 

W-forward, 

S-backwards, 

A-left, 

D-right, 

space - jump and 

shift- sprint.

Credits:Nikola Knögel

Disclaimer: This game was made just for entertainment purpoises its not here to offend nobody.
